posts.post_title: FS: PSA Graded T201 - Cobb, Mathewson, Johnson, Evers
posts.post_content:
I have the following PSA Graded T201's for sale. Prices are dlvd with payment by Paypal Gift or Check/Money Order. Cards present very nice for their respective grade.

Crawford/Cobb PSA 1 - $220
Evers/Chance PSA 2 - $130
Johnson/Street PSA 1.5 - $130
Mathewson/Bridwell PSA 1 - $130
Lajoie PSA 1(MK) Stamp on back - $100

I have scans available.

Matt
